SELECT TB_EMP.EMP_NO , TB_EMP.USER_NM FROM TB_EMP
ORDER BY USER_NM

SELECT A.DSCSN_NO , A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT , A.DSCSN_DT , A.DSCSN_CN , C.CD_NM AS DSCSN_YN , A.DSCSN_RSLT , D.CD_NM AS APRV_YN , E.CD_NM AS DSCSN_CD , A.DSCSNROOM_CD , F.USER_NM AS EMP_NO , B.USER_NM AS STU_NO FROM TB_DSCSN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STU B ON A.STU_NO = B.STU_NO INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD C on C.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') -1) and C.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') + 1) and C.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D001' and C.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD D on D.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, 1, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') -1) and D.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') + 1) and D.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D002' and D.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD E on E.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') -1) and E.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') + 1) and E.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D003' and E.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP F ON A.EMP_NO = F.EMP_NO WHERE A.APRV_YN = 'D002-1' AND A.STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT DESC

SELECT A.DSCSN_NO , A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT , A.DSCSN_DT , A.DSCSN_CN , C.CD_NM AS DSCSN_YN , A.DSCSN_RSLT , D.CD_NM AS APRV_YN , E.CD_NM AS DSCSN_CD , A.DSCSNROOM_CD , F.USER_NM AS EMP_NO , B.USER_NM AS STU_NO , G.CONSUL_NM , R.CONSUL_BGNG_HR , R.CONSUL_DDLB_HR FROM TB_DSCSN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STU B ON A.STU_NO = B.STU_NO INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD C on C.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') -1) and C.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') + 1) and C.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D001' and C.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD D on D.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, 1, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') -1) and D.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') + 1) and D.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D002' and D.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD E on E.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') -1) and E.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') + 1) and E.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D003' and E.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP F ON A.EMP_NO = F.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CONSULTING_ROOM G ON A.DSCSNROOM_CD = G.CONSUL_CD JOIN TB_CONSUL_RESERVATION R ON R.DSCSN_NO = A.DSCSN_NO WHERE A.APRV_YN = 'D002-2' AND A.DSCSN_YN = 'D001-1' AND A.STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT DESC

SELECT A.DSCSN_NO , A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT , A.DSCSN_DT , A.DSCSN_CN , C.CD_NM AS DSCSN_YN , A.DSCSN_RSLT , D.CD_NM AS APRV_YN , E.CD_NM AS DSCSN_CD , A.DSCSNROOM_CD , F.USER_NM AS EMP_NO , B.USER_NM AS STU_NO , R.REJECT_CN FROM TB_DSCSN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STU B ON A.STU_NO = B.STU_NO INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD C on C.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') -1) and C.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, INSTR(A.DSCSN_YN, '-') + 1) and C.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D001' and C.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD D on D.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, 1, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') -1) and D.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.APRV_YN, INSTR(A.APRV_YN, '-') + 1) and D.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D002' and D.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y'
INNER JOIN TB_CM_CD E on E.CD_TYPE_ID = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, 1, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') -1) and E.CD_VL = SUBSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, INSTR(A.DSCSN_CD, '-') + 1) and E.CD_TYPE_ID = 'D003' and E.CD_C_USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP F ON A.EMP_NO = F.EMP_NO JOIN TB_REJECT R ON R.DSCSN_NO = A.DSCSN_NO WHERE A.APRV_YN = 'D002-3' AND A.STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY A.DSCSN_RSLT_DT DESC
